docs.text: Fylik API Welcome to Fylik open API. This documentation describes API methods for integrate you project with Fylik. Base URL The base URL for your API requests is: https://api.fylik.ru Please be notified that our server is secured and drops all bad requests. If your requests are being dropped by our server, you can deploy your own Fylik API instance.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Welcome to Fylik open API. This documentation describes API methods for integrate you project with Fylik.
docs.title: Fylik API

docs.text: The base URL for your API requests is: https://api.fylik.ru Please be notified that our server is secured and drops all bad requests. If your requests are being dropped by our server, you can deploy your own Fylik API instance.
docs.title: Base URL

docs.text: File download Request To download file, send GET request to /download/:fileId when fileId is file id ( _id field) Response You fill receive file contents
docs.title: File download

docs.text: To download file, send GET request to /download/:fileId when fileId is file id ( _id field)
docs.title: Request

docs.text: You fill receive file contents
docs.title: Response

docs.text: Fetch file list Request To fetch actually uploaded files list, send GET request to: /files with parameters: Parameter name Parameter description Parameter type Required offset File list offset (use for pagination) integer false limit Max files in response integer false Response You fill receive array of files. For more details, see File model Sample response: [ { "_id": "6238fe6533a12239d256ed0a", "name": "Space Cats — Magic Fly.mp4", "size": 9528596, "type": "video/mp4", "expiresIn": "2022-03-21T23:02:29.361Z", "createdAt": "2022-03-21T22:38:29.361Z" }, { "_id": "6238fea133a12239d256ed0b", "name": "Y2Mate.is - TroyBoi - Afterhours (feat. Diplo & Nina Sky).mp3", "size": 4546605, "type": "audio/mpeg", "expiresIn": "2022-03-21T22:51:29.413Z", "createdAt": "2022-03-21T22:39:29.414Z" }, { "_id": "6238ff5533a12239d256ed0c", "name": "Space Cats — Magic Fly.mp4", "size": 9528596, "type": "video/mp4", "expiresIn": "2022-03-21T23:06:29.545Z", "createdAt": "2022-03-21T22:42:29.545Z" } ] Live update To get file list in live time, connect via WebSocket to https://socket.api.fylik.ru and get 'newFile' event
docs.title: Getting file list

docs.text: To fetch actually uploaded files list, send GET request to: /files with parameters: Parameter name Parameter description Parameter type Required offset File list offset (use for pagination) integer false limit Max files in response integer false
docs.title: Request

docs.text: You fill receive array of files. For more details, see File model
docs.title: Response

docs.text: [ { "_id": "6238fe6533a12239d256ed0a", "name": "Space Cats — Magic Fly.mp4", "size": 9528596, "type": "video/mp4", "expiresIn": "2022-03-21T23:02:29.361Z", "createdAt": "2022-03-21T22:38:29.361Z" }, { "_id": "6238fea133a12239d256ed0b", "name": "Y2Mate.is - TroyBoi - Afterhours (feat. Diplo & Nina Sky).mp3", "size": 4546605, "type": "audio/mpeg", "expiresIn": "2022-03-21T22:51:29.413Z", "createdAt": "2022-03-21T22:39:29.414Z" }, { "_id": "6238ff5533a12239d256ed0c", "name": "Space Cats — Magic Fly.mp4", "size": 9528596, "type": "video/mp4", "expiresIn": "2022-03-21T23:06:29.545Z", "createdAt": "2022-03-21T22:42:29.545Z" } ]

docs.text: To get file list in live time, connect via WebSocket to https://socket.api.fylik.ru and get 'newFile' event
docs.title: Live update

docs.text: File model This is file object description (model): interface File { _id: string, // File unqual ID name: string, // File regular name size: number, // File size in bytes type: string, // File MIME type expiresIn: Date, // Timestamp when file will be deleted createdAt: Date // Timestamp when file was uploaded }
docs.title: File model

docs.text: This is file object description (model): interface File { _id: string, // File unqual ID name: string, // File regular name size: number, // File size in bytes type: string, // File MIME type expiresIn: Date, // Timestamp when file will be deleted createdAt: Date // Timestamp when file was uploaded }
docs.title: File model

docs.text: Fetch Fylik upload limits Fylik API limits amount of uploads and max uploading file size. Request To fetch upload limits, send GET request to: /limits Response You will receive JSON with limits Sample response: { "maxFileSize": 104857600, // Max uploading file size in bytes "maxFilesPerClient": 3 // Max amount of files to be uploaded per IP }
docs.title: Upload limits

docs.text: Fylik API limits amount of uploads and max uploading file size.
docs.title: Fetch Fylik upload limits

docs.text: To fetch upload limits, send GET request to: /limits
docs.title: Request

docs.text: You will receive JSON with limits
docs.title: Response

docs.text: { "maxFileSize": 104857600, // Max uploading file size in bytes "maxFilesPerClient": 3 // Max amount of files to be uploaded per IP }
docs.title: Sample response:

docs.text: File upload Request To upload a file, * send POST request to /upload with your file as file field. Response You fill file object like File model Sample response: { "_id": "6238fe6533a12239d256ed0a", "name": "Space Cats — Magic Fly.mp4", "size": 9528596, "type": "video/mp4", "expiresIn": "2022-03-21T23:02:29.361Z", "createdAt": "2022-03-21T22:38:29.361Z" } See also Upload limits
docs.title: File upload

docs.text: To upload a file, * send POST request to /upload with your file as file field.
docs.title: Request

docs.text: You fill file object like File model
docs.title: Response

docs.text: Upload limits
